mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_PW, MEMBER_PHONE, PROFILE_PATH, REAL_PROFILE_PATH, member_grade, 'ROLE_' || MEMBER_GRADE role, CON_IP, job_id, dept_id, (SELECT job_name FROM job WHERE job_id = member.job_id) job_name, (SELECT dept_name FROM department WHERE dept_id = member.dept_id) dept_name, EMP_STATUS, CON_STATUS, COMPANY_ID, LOGIN_FAIL, LOGIN_LOCK, MAIL_KEY, MAIL_AUTH, COMPANY_ACCP FROM member WHERE company_id = #{companyId}

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member ( member_id, member_name, member_pw, member_phone, member_grade ) VALUES ( #{memberId}, #{memberName}, #{memberPw}, #{memberPhone}, 'H3' )

member_name = #{memberName},

mapper.select: WITH a AS (SELECT COUNT(pp.prj_particir_id) particir_number, pp.project_id FROM prj_particir pp LEFT JOIN project p ON pp.project_id = p.project_id WHERE pp.particir_accp = 'A1' group by pp.project_id) SELECT p.project_name, p.project_id, a.particir_number, pp.project_markup FROM (project p JOIN prj_particir pp ON p.project_id = pp.project_id) LEFT JOIN a ON a.project_id = p.project_id WHERE pp.member_id= #{memberId} ORDER BY p.project_id DESC
